$transcoder_client = new ElasticTranscoderClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'region' => 'us-east-2',
    'version' => '2012-09-25',
]);

try {
    $result = $transcoder_client -> listPipelines([]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage() . "\n";
}
